releaseNotes:
- Add PIN security for transfers & improve TV focus UX.

- Add Lottie animations and Shimmer loading effects to Mobile and TV screens and many more...

- Team Netra

changelog.text: Added PIN security for transfers & improve TV focus UX.
Added Lottie animations and Shimmer loading effects to Mobile and TV screens.
Fixing the issue where D-pad navigation was unresponsive upon loading.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
